get.description: Returns a list of users. Can be filtered by the search query parameter.
Returns a specific user by ID.

put.description: Updates an existing user by ID.

delete.description: Deletes an existing user by ID.

get.description: Returns a list of channel names.

get.summary: Get campaign types for a specific channel
get.description: Retrieve a list of campaign types for the specified channel.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns the list of campaign types.

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong on the server side.

get.description: Returns a list of client names.
This endpoint retrieves a specific client by its unique ID.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the client to retrieve.

get.summary: Get marketing campaigns by client ID

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the advertisement (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, etc.)

parameters.name: campaignType
parameters.description: The type of the campaign (e.g., OUTCOME_TRAFFIC, OUTCOME_SALES, etc.)

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to find campaigns (can be multiple, separated by commas)

get.summary: Get non orchestrated campaigns for a specific client
get.description: Retrieve a list of non orchestrated campaigns based on the specified parameters for a given client.

400.description: Missing required fields: channel, campaignName, campaignType

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong on the server side.

parameters.name: adsetName
parameters.description: The name of the campaign set

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to find campaigns (can be multiple, separated by commas)

get.summary: Get adsets for a specific campaign of a client
get.description: Retrieve a list of adsets of a campaign based on the specified parameters for a given client.

500.description: Internal server error. Something went wrong on the server side.

get.summary: Get campaigns for a marketing campaign
Get a specific campaign for a marketing campaign

put.summary: Update goals for a specific campaign in a marketing campaign

goals.example:
1. Do something
2. Do something else
3. Nothing else

put.summary: Pause a specific campaign in a marketing campaign

delete.summary: Delete a specific campaign in a marketing campaign

patch.summary: Mark a notification as read by ID

404.description: Notification not found or already marked as read

goals.example:
1. Do something
2. Do something else
3. Nothing else
